title: Terazza Einaudi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fine dining restaurant featuring a first floor conservatory/terrace overlooking a small piazza. Offers a separate vegan menu with many choices for each course: has bruschetta, quinoa falafel, seitan pasta, tofu and seitan dishes, and desserts like tofu strawberry pudding, fruit crumble, and chocolate mousse. Also offers vegan tasting menu events throughout the year.
